Articles.Content:
Hiya. I figured it was time to actually post, been lurking for a while. I don't recall the version that started me on KSP (0.25? I think?), but my obsession really kicked in with 1.0

Great community here, which only adds to a great game.

Hello grouchybastid, and welcome to the forums!

I'm glad you already find the community great, and it's always good to welcome a lurker in from the cold.

Happy landings!

Yes Hello grouchybastid!

Looks like the community is waiting patiently for the next updates, this is gonna be big fun soon...
